channel.title: Official Hybrid Sessions - Three in the Mix - Podcast
channel.itunes:author: Dave Carters
channel.description: You are subscribed to the official Hybrid Sessions - Three in the Mix - Podcast presented Dave Carters.Listen to the finest in Trance and Progressive - updated every week. For a the full 60 min aired Radio Radio Sets register free at www.davecarters.com/register.php Enjoy
channel.itunes:subtitle: Everything you need to fire up your week
channel.itunes:summary: You are subscribed to the official Hybrid Sessions - Three in the Mix - Podcast presented Dave Carters.Listen to the finest in Trance and Progressive - updated every week. For a the full 60 min aired Radio Radio Sets register free at www.davecarters.com/register.php Enjoy

image.title: Official Hybrid Sessions - Three in the Mix - Podcast

channel.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 016
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: No words....Tracks by Chris Lake, Daft Punk, Adam K and Mattise & Sadko
item.itunes:subtitle: No words....Tracks by Chris Lake, Daft Punk, Adam K and Mattise & Sadko
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 015
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: Ready for holiday action...But first: new podcast...tracks by Gareth Emery, Arty and a nice mashup by Moonbeam and Pendulum
item.itunes:subtitle: Ready for holiday action...But first: new podcast...tracks by Gareth Emery, Arty and a nice mashup by Moonbeam and Pendulum
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 014
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: Winter is over??Mhh...lets heat up with Porter Robinson and Knife Party
item.itunes:subtitle: Winter is over??Mhh...lets heat up with Porter Robinson and Knife Party
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 013
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: Its mashup time..enjoy...Eric Prydz, Coldplay, M-3ox, Mark Mendes, Dirty South
item.itunes:subtitle: Its mashup time..enjoy...Eric Prydz, Coldplay, M-3ox, Mark Mendes, Dirty South
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 012
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: When rebound is calling you are walking alone in my mind ..One Mashup? No, could be the title of the three tracks mashed up together. Arty & Mat Zo, Feenixpaul, Dirty South and those usual Suspects
item.itunes:subtitle: When rebound is calling you are walking alone in my mind ..One Mashup? No, could be the title of the three tracks mashed up together. Arty & Mat Zo, Feenixpaul, Dirty South and those usual Suspects
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 011
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: No words, just music by Paul Oakenfold, Shogun and a realy nice Mashup containing tracks by Ioo, Sebastian Krieg and Jerome Isma-Ae
item.itunes:subtitle: No words, just music by Paul Oakenfold, Shogun and a realy nice Mashup containing tracks by Ioo, Sebastian Krieg and Jerome Isma-Ae
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 010
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: Happy new year..Tired???Wake up with this nice tunes...Starting up with a little bit of Minimal by Paul Kalkbrenner..ending up with banging Psy Trance by Liquid Logic
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy new year..Tired???Wake up with this nice tunes...Starting up with a little bit of Minimal by Paul Kalkbrenner..ending up with banging Psy Trance by Liquid Logic
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 009
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: If you have eat too much over X-Mas its time for fat burning ;-) FLX, Nifra and Orjan Nilsen are going to help you
item.itunes:subtitle: If you have eat too much over X-Mas its time for fat burning ;-) FLX, Nifra and Orjan Nilsen are going to help you
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 008
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: T-5 Days till X-Mas:-) T-7 Days to the Session 009. To shorten up the waitingtime here are three new tracks by Cramp, Blackfeel wite and an unknow bootleg from Massive Attacks bomb "Teardrop"
item.itunes:subtitle: T-5 Days till X-Mas:-) T-7 Days to the Session 009. To shorten up the waitingtime here are three new tracks by Cramp, Blackfeel wite and an unknow bootleg from Massive Attacks bomb "Teardrop"
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 007
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: X-Mas is still waiting...Here are some goodies for you :-) 2nd Phase, Ashley Wallbridge and Luke Porter with their new tunes
item.itunes:subtitle: X-Mas is still waiting...Here are some goodies for you :-) 2nd Phase, Ashley Wallbridge and Luke Porter with their new tunes
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 006
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: Its getting colder and colder outside. Time to heat up the room...Jochen Miller, Björn Akesson and Rafael Frost are ready to be your heater!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Its getting colder and colder outside. Time to heat up the room...Jochen Miller, Björn Akesson and Rafael Frost are ready to be your heater!!!
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 005
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: Prepare for a baning podcast loaded with tracks by W&W, Coldplay and Asterix (without Obelix ;-) )
item.itunes:subtitle: Prepare for a baning podcast loaded with tracks by W&W, Coldplay and Asterix (without Obelix ;-) )
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 004
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: The winter is comin...its still cold outside. So its time for some hot tunes! New tracks by BT feat. Kirsty Hawkshaw, Maor Levi and Genix. The last two ones are actually only available on the A&B Anjunabeat VOL.9 compilation
item.itunes:subtitle: The winter is comin...its still cold outside. So its time for some hot tunes! New tracks by BT feat. Kirsty Hawkshaw, Maor Levi and Genix. The last two ones are actually only available on the A&B Anjunabeat VOL.9 compilation
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 003
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: New week, new music. Listen loud to Cosmic Gate feat. JES and Ferry Corsten
item.itunes:subtitle: New week, new music. Listen loud to Cosmic Gate feat. JES and Ferry Corsten
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 002
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: Welcome to the second episode of the "Three in the mix" Podcast. Fresh new tunes from the past weeks. Please welcome the guys from Above and Beyond, Ronski Speed and Lange feat. Sarah Howells
item.itunes:subtitle: Welcome to the second episode of the "Three in the mix" Podcast. Fresh new tunes from the past weeks. Please welcome the guys from Above and Beyond, Ronski Speed and Lange feat. Sarah Howells
item.itunes:keywords: Trance, Progressive, Paul van Dyk, Dave Carters, Arty, Above and Beyond, Myon and Shane54

item.title: Session 001
item.itunes:author: Dave Carters
item.description: First epsiode of the new high quality "Three in the Mix" podcast by Dave Carters. This time tunes by Tritonal, Marco V and A.M.R
item.itunes:subtitle: First epsiode of the new high quality "Three in the Mix" podcast by Dave Carters. This time tunes by Tritonal, Marco V and A.M.R
